org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.put

Class PutIndexedScriptRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextAndHeaderHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<PutIndexedScriptRequest>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.indexedscripts.put.PutIndexedScriptRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, HasContext, HasContextAndHeaders, HasHeaders, Streamable

    public class PutIndexedScriptRequest
extends ActionRequest<PutIndexedScriptRequest>
implements IndicesRequest
    Index request to index a script to the script index and make it available at search time.

    The request requires the scriptLang(String), id(String) and source(byte[]) to be set.

    The source (content to index) can be set in its bytes form using (source() (byte[])}), its string form (source(String)) or using a XContentBuilder (source(org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.XContentBuilder)).

    If the id(String) is not set, it will be automatically generated.

    See Also:
    PutIndexedScriptResponse
